oups.com

        MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRG=
O / LEE / DEPP





        (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy balls and fire=
s a missile at Nightlight.)



        (Barrymore takes one of the energy b=
alls to the chest but dodges the other with a side jump. She fires 6 laser =
beams at Nightlight.)



        (Depp is struck by both energy balls, taki=
ng them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 shots at Nightlight.)



       =
 (Alba ducks the energy balls and pulls a pin from a grenade and throws it =
in front of the Chivtron base.)



        (Stiller growls and fires an arr=
ow at Arrow.)



        (Lee fires a ball of fire at Nightlight's legs, at=
tempting to trip her up.)



        (Virgo fires a red energy draining dar=
t at Nightlight...)

          Nightlight::

          Nightlight tried to defe=
nd herself, and dificulty she could avoid the 
          attacks of McGowan=
 and Stronghold, She fired 2 energy balls to 
          McGowan, 2 against =
Barrymore, 2 agaisnt Alba, 2 against Depp, 2 
          against Airbomber, =
2 agaisnt Stranato and 2 against Stronghold. But 
          she was hit by =
the combined attack of Barrymore and Stranato, doing 
          her fell. 
=

          She felt stunned and she would be defendless a short while.
